name: LEGO Creator: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
name_original: LEGO Creator: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description:
LEGO Creator: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets is an arcade game developed by Qube Software. It came out on 01-12-2002. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Creator: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets on PC.
